original_title: National Theatre Live: All of Us
overview: Jess has a great life: a job she loves, a sharp sense of humour and a close group of friends.  When austerity threatens the world she has worked hard to build, Jess makes a stand to protect those she holds most dear.  Inspired by real life experiences of disabled people in the UK, All of Us captures the humour, sadness and joy of everyday life, and is a passionate and timely look at the human cost of abandoning those who struggle to fit in.
tagline: A powerful new play about making a stand.
title: National Theatre Live: All of Us
